summary: This memorandum discusses Herbert Itkin and Mario Brod, focusing on Itkin's alleged contacts with the CIA and Allen Dulles. It outlines an investigation into Itkin's claims of providing information to the CIA, his contacts with Philip Harbin, and a possible meeting with Allen Dulles. The memo also includes information on Itkin's past associations and his connections to a lawyer with contacts at the United Nations.
title: Herbert Itkin/Mario Brod et. al.
